calculate.name: CALCULATE YOUR BMI
calculate.description: Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women.

result.one: You are underweight. It's important to eat a balanced diet and consult with a healthcare provider to determine the cause and address it appropriately.
result.two: You have a healthy weight. Keep up with your balanced diet and regular physical activity to maintain your weight.
result.three: You are overweight. Consider adopting a healthier diet and increasing your physical activity. Consulting with a healthcare provider can also help you create a plan.
result.four: You are obese. It's important to take action to reduce your weight through a healthy diet and regular exercise. Seeking advice from a healthcare provider is highly recommended.
